update SNP_TABLE set I_SC_ORIG_TABLE = I_SC_ORIG_TABLE + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_SC_ORIG_TABLE AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_TRT set I_TRT = I_TRT + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_TRT AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_TRT set I_STATE = I_STATE + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_STATE AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_TRT set I_FOLDER = I_FOLDER + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_FOLDER AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_TRT set I_TXT_TRT_TXT = I_TXT_TRT_TXT + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_TXT_TRT_TXT AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_TRT set I_PROJECT = I_PROJECT + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_PROJECT AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_TRT set I_SC_TRT = I_SC_TRT + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_SC_TRT AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_TRT set I_SC_BASE_TRT = I_SC_BASE_TRT + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_SC_BASE_TRT AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_TRT set I_SC_ORIG_TRT = I_SC_ORIG_TRT + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_SC_ORIG_TRT AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_TXT set I_TXT = I_TXT + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_TXT AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_TXT_CROSSR set I_TXT = I_TXT + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_TXT AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_TXT_CROSSR set I_TABLE = I_TABLE + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_TABLE AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_TXT_CROSSR set I_COL = I_COL + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_COL AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_TXT_CROSSR set I_VAR = I_VAR + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_VAR AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_TXT_CROSSR set SEQ_ID = SEQ_ID + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(SEQ_ID AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_TXT_CROSSR set I_POP_COL = I_POP_COL + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_POP_COL AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_TXT_CROSSR set I_UFUNC = I_UFUNC + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_UFUNC AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_TXT_HEADER set I_TXT = I_TXT + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_TXT AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UE_ORIG set I_UE_ORIG = I_UE_ORIG + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_UE_ORIG AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UE_USED set I_USER_EXIT = I_USER_EXIT + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_USER_EXIT AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UE_USED set I_INSTANCE = I_INSTANCE + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_INSTANCE AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UE_USED set I_TXT_VALUE = I_TXT_VALUE + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_TXT_VALUE AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UFUNC set I_UFUNC = I_UFUNC + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_UFUNC AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UFUNC set I_PROJECT = I_PROJECT + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_PROJECT AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UFUNC set I_TXT_DEF = I_TXT_DEF + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_TXT_DEF AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UFUNC set I_TXT_DESC = I_TXT_DESC + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_TXT_DESC AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UFUNC_IMPL set I_UFUNC_IMPL = I_UFUNC_IMPL + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_UFUNC_IMPL AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UFUNC_IMPL set I_UFUNC = I_UFUNC + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_UFUNC AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UFUNC_IMPL set I_TXT_IMPL = I_TXT_IMPL + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_TXT_IMPL AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_UFUNC_TECHNO set I_UFUNC_IMPL = I_UFUNC_IMPL + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_UFUNC_IMPL AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_USER_EXIT set I_USER_EXIT = I_USER_EXIT + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_USER_EXIT AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_USER_EXIT set I_TRT = I_TRT + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_TRT AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_USER_EXIT set I_TXT_UE_HELP = I_TXT_UE_HELP + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_TXT_UE_HELP AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
update SNP_USER_EXIT set I_TXT_VALUE = I_TXT_VALUE + :NEWOFFSET where CAST(I_TXT_VALUE AS CHAR) like :OLDMASK
